attributes.action: Set in motion some sort of action to allow local councils to build disabled access 3 bedroom bungalows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a desperate need for suitable, disabled access bungalows with 3 bedrooms, to allow families to care for a severe disabled child, most families in this position are having to live in totally unsuitable properties, this in turn adds to the stresses of being a carer,
People are crying out for this type of property, these people are stay at home carers and as such save the government a lot of money,
Surely, they should be helped to carry on.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Set in motion some sort of action to allow local councils to build disabled access 3 bedroom bungalows."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
